sn1.58:1.1: “Deviation” is uppatha (“off course”). | These questions and answers are included in SN 1.76.
sn1.58:1.4: A reference to the belief that bathing in water brings purity. Compare the “inner bathing” at MN 7:18.5.
sn1.58:2.5: “Fervor and celibacy” (tapas and brahmacariya) are closely linked in Atharvaveda 11.5.
